entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
